title: Spiritual | Chiropractor in Las Vegas, NV | Active Nevada Chiropractic & Wellness, LLC
description: Spiritual in Las Vegas, NV. Active Nevada Chiropractic & Wellness, LLC is your local Chiropractor in Las Vegas serving all of your needs. Call us today at (702) 474-4400 for an appointment.
cleaned_text: Einstein reputedly divided people in two groups, those who believe we live in a friendly universe, and those who don't.
